text: Egha kɨ faragha Damaskusɨn nguibamɨn akam akunigha, egha Jerusalemɨn akam akunigha, egha Judan nguibaba bar dar akam akurava, egha uaghan Kantrin Igharazibar Gumaziba sara akam me mɨkɨra ghaze, ‘Ia uan navibagh iragh egh ua God bagh izɨ. Eghtɨ ian arazir ia amiba, ian gun mɨkɨm suam, ia navibagh iragha gɨfa.’
